raw_comment:
What do you notice?
What do you wonder?
How does this relate to you and your community?
What’s going on in this graph? Create a catchy headline that captures the graph’s main idea.
I notice that 15- to 24 year olds say the world is getting better with each generation.
I wonder how the older generation feel about the younger generation.
This relates to my community because the young adults are more optimistic and think of different ways to help the future.Can the younger generation help better the future generations
ace_sentences: I notice that people who are 15 to 24 years old say that the world is getting better with each generation.
I wonder how older people feel about younger people.
In my community, young adults are more optimistic than older adults.
In my community, young adults think of different ways to help the future.
I ask whether the younger generation can help to improve the future for future generations.
The headline is: Young adults are optimistic about the world getting better with each generation.
